title: Scribd
description: Scribd is a living library of over 200 million documents shared by an engaged global community. Explore academic papers, legal documents, hobbyist and DIY content, user manuals, and so much more. Enjoy endless discovery across every topic and niche, and get answers you won’t find anywhere else. Sign up for a 30-day free trial to download content and browse without ads. Your monthly subscription also includes ad-free access to Everand and SlideShare.
